titleStmt.title: The humble address of the corporation of Trinity-House
titleStmt.author: Trinity House (London, England)
Berkeley, George Berkeley, Earl of, 1627-1698.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Rich. Royston, bookseller to His most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: With an introduction by George Berkeley, Earl of Berkeley, and the response of Charles II.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
